title: Spark
description: EARTH. FIRE. AIR. WATER.He could feel flames coming through the floor, looking for him. Sparks and ash rained down. He wasn't going to make it. He was going to fail. Again. Then a hand closed over his wrist and pulled, hard.Gabriel Merrick plays with fire. Literally. Sometimes he can even control it. And sometimes he can’t. So when an arsonist wreaks havoc on his town all the signs point to Gabriel.Layne is strangely drawn to him. Layne understands family problems, and she understands secrets. She has a few of her own.Gabriel can’t let Layne know that the danger that’s right at his heels. But there are some risks he can’t help taking.THE FUSE IS LIT…
author: Brigid Kemmerer
